title: 62 base AD but only 61 physical damage to minions
body: At whatever level I get 62 base ad on Ryze I only produce 61 physical damage. This doesn't seem like much but I feel like I miss CS because of this sometimes.

replies.body: Might be a decimal problem. You might have 61.5 AD, which gets displayed as 62 AD. You then deal 61.5/62 HP, and rather than round down to 0 HP it keeps them at 0.5 HP, which then is displayed rounded up to 1 HP.

> [{quoted}](name=DrCyanide,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qTVQ4vMo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-08-06T05:47:39.287+0000)
>
> Might be a decimal problem. You might have 61.5 AD, which gets displayed as 62 AD. You then deal 61.5/62 HP, and rather than round down to 0 HP it keeps them at 0.5 HP, which then is displayed rounded up to 1 HP.

Rito I shouldn't have to do college-level calculus-type calculations to know why I can't cs >.>

I get the sarcasm here.... but seriously.

"COLLEGE LEVEL" is a little extreme.
Rounding is college level or calculus?

> [{quoted}](name=Eedat,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qTVQ4vMo,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2018-08-06T15:17:22.844+0000)
>
> Rounding is college level or calculus?

Boi it was just a prank
